title: Sara Sara Saara Lyrics Vaagai Sooda Va Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Chinmayi
Song: Sara Sara Saara Kathu
Lyrics : Vairamuthu
Movie: Vaagai Sooda Va
Music Director : M Ghibran

[Sara Sara Saara Kathu veesum podhum 
sir ah paarthu pesum podhum
sarapaambu pola nenju satham poduthey] (2)

[Ithu Ithu, Ithu poana nenju thaika
Otha paarva paarthu selu motha sotha
Eluthi thaaren moochu utpada ](2)

Sara Sara Saara Kathu veesum podhum 
sir ah paarthu pesum podhum
sarapaambu pola nenju satham poduthey

Enga ooru pidikutha ?, Enga thaani inikutha ?
Suthi varum kaathula, suttu irul madakutha
Mutta kozhi pudikava, moonu padi samaikava
Elumbathu kadikayil, enna konjam ninaikava
Kammanj soru rusikava, samacha kaiya konjam rasikava
Modakathan rasam vachi, madakathaan paakuren
Retta dhosa suttu vachi, Kaava kaakuren

Mukkanna nongu thaan vekkiren
Mandu Nee kagayen ketkura

Sara Sara Saara Kathu veesum podhum 
sir ah paarthu pesum podhum
sarapaambu pola nenju satham poduthey

Pullu kattu vaasama, buthi kulla veesura
Maatu mani sathama, mansakul ketkura
kattavandi oattura, kaiyalavu manasula 
Kaiyaeluthu podura kanni ponnu marbula
Moonu naala paakala, ooril endha poovum pookala
Aatu kallu kuliyila urangi povoam poonayai
Thanna vandhu parthuthan kirangi porenya

Meenuku aengura kokku nee....
Kothave theriyala makku nee.

Sara Sara Saara Kathu veesum podhum  ...
Ithu Ithu, Ithu poana nenju thaika ...

Kaatu malligai poothiriukuthu kadhala kadhala
Vandhu vandhu oadipogum vandukena kaaichala


Vaagai Sooda Va Lyrics

2. Sara Sara Saara Kaathu Lyrics
3 Senga Soola Kaara
